entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: Did you know that between the time Trump restricted travel from China on February 2nd and declared a coronavirus national emergency on March 13, he held 6 rallies, played golf twice, traveled to India, spent a weekend in Vegas and Mara-a-Lago and held a fundraiser in California?
